maino: they say people like me end up dead or in the jail cell no food had to eat off of crack sales before u try to judge me off of my life style put your self in the shoes of a black male whats my chances of gettin out of poverty its my god given right to pull a robbery society labels me a misfitter but in the street im looked at as a real nigga my bandana in my right hand i fold it up and tie it around my whole hood they dont understand why i keep a rag why its hanging on the back of my pants i keep one maybe two or three represents where i come from its a g thing salute all the young boys and the ogs every thug in the country knows me
